channel.title: The p-hats i dont know how to do all this stuff
channel.description: plz help me to understand what to do with these #'s for the p-hats i would be very happy.... :D lol

item.title: The p-hats i dont know how to do all this stuff
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Okay, its very simple.
All you need to do is type ::pickup (id code of item) (ammount)

So it would look like this if I wanted 9999 Abbyssal whips…
::pickup 4151 9999

Then press enter and your item should appear in your inventory but you have to be Admin or Owner. (GOLD CROWN)

Read full topic
item.source: The p-hats i dont know how to do all this stuff
